Exclusive: Nvidia's new China-focused AI chip set to be sold at similar price to Huawei productNvidia has started taking pre-orders for a new China-specific artificial intelligence (AI) chip from distributors who are pricing it on par with a rival product from Huawei, sources familiar with the matter said. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 07:40:54 GMT MU7TZL2K2JKFLO5MS4WP6OV7WQ https://www.reuters.com/technology/nvidias-new-china-focused-ai-chip-set-be-sold-similar-price-huawei-product-2024-02-01/Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh技术
Vietnam rare earths output drops as China's grows, US saysThe U.S. geological agency has sharply revised down estimates on Vietnam's rare earths output and expects a further drop despite its rich resource base, according to an annual report, which showed a rise in dominant producer China's output. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 06:54:49 GMT 655GHC4YBNIPFLR3ATYRDSO6EA https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/vietnam-rare-earths-output-drops-chinas-grows-us-says-2024-02-01/Francesco Guarascio市场商品
Philippines plans to buy submarines to defend sovereignty in South China Sea - senior officialPhilippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr has approved the third phase of the military's modernisation, which includes the purchase of the country's first submarine, in order to defend its maritime sovereignty in the disputed South China Sea. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 06:18:54 GMT CJKBYIIBJ5M33OMVNAWVGBNKMU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-plans-buy-submarines-defend-sovereignty-south-china-sea-senior-2024-02-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Volvo Cars to stop funding Polestar, may hand stake to GeelySwedish automaker Volvo Cars said on Thursday it would stop providing funding to Polestar Automotive Holding , handing responsibility for the luxury car brand to China's Geely Holding which is also Volvo's top owner. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 06:09:35 GMT TPPWV2HRIJJBXK7B2XY​​57VBMCQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/automaker-volvo-cars-stop-funding-polestar-quarterly-earnings-above-estimates-2024-02-01/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Morning Bid: For markets, a Fed delay means more in MayA look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 05:33:31 GMT FJC5C3WJJZMZ5GKBETC6G24BNE https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/global-markets-view-europe-2024-02-01/Reuters市场欧洲市场
Human Rights Watch warns carmakers over China forced labour riskHuman Rights Watch urged automakers such as Tesla, Volkswagen and BYD to do more to ensure materials that could be made using Uyghur forced labour do not enter their supply chain. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 05:09:45 GMT QMV64UJCENJIRCCVCRDJLB2QYN4 https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/ human-rights-watch-warns-carmakers-over-china-forced-labour-risk-2024-02-01/Brenda Goh商业工作世界
Hong Kong court convicts four for rioting after 2019 legislature stormingA Hong Kong court on Thursday found four people guilty of rioting after the legislature of the financial centre was stormed during pro-democracy protests in 2019, joining eight others who had pleaded guilty to charges over the incident. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 03:11:14 GMT GPQSQ3S2HVJP5DNB3EXSCBAM4M https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-court-convicts-four-rioting-after-2019-legislature-storming-2024-02-01/Jessie Pang, Edward Cho世界中国
Asia's factories struggle for momentum amid soft Chinese demandAsia's factories delivered a largely patchy performance in January, surveys showed on Thursday, as soft Chinese demand left the region's economies on a shaky footing at the start of 2024. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 03:02:46 GMT 3LJBMPVXQ5MARH5GMI6NBO73SM https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-economy-asias-factories-struggle-momentum-amid-soft-chinese-demand-2024-02-01/Leika Kihara市场宏观问题
China's fiscal revenue growth picks up in 2023China's fiscal revenue rose 6.4% in 2023 from a year earlier, picking up significantly from a 0.6% increase in COVID-hit 2022, China's Vice Finance Minister Wang Dongwei told a press conference in Beijing on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 03:00:02 GMT YXPOGGYN2NIMPPMC72OCGLOFXE https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinas-fiscal-revenue-growth-picks-up-2023-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中国
Tesla China offers cash discounts for some Model Y typesTesla China is offering 8,000 yuan ($1,114) of cash discounts from Thursday for some types of Model Y vehicles, it said on its official social media account. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 02:54:54 GMT GRW7T6S65RJ3FMPDREFOKT24IU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-china-offers-cash-discounts-some-model-y-types-2024-02-01/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China new home prices rise at fastest pace in nearly 2-1/2 years -private surveyChina's new home prices rose in January at the fastest monthly pace in nearly 2-1/2 years, according to a survey released on Thursday, following a slew of government support measures and expectations of further relaxation in homebuying policies.
